last_episode_to_air.name: Star Warners
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the series finale of Pinky and the Brain, the Brain, and the characters from Animaniacs develop a Star Wars spoof.

name: Pinky and the Brain
overview: Pinky and Brain are genetically enhanced laboratory mice who reside in a cage in the Acme Labs research facility. Brain is self-centered and scheming; Pinky is good-natured but feebleminded. In each episode, Brain devises a new plan to take over the world, which ultimately ends in failure, usually due to Pinky's idiocy, the impossibility of Brain's plan, Brain's own arrogance, or just circumstances beyond their control.

episodes.name: Das Mouse
episodes.overview: Brain hatches a plot to hypnotize people, but he needs white crab meat to succeed. In order to get the crab meat, he takes a submarine to the wreck of the Titanic. Unfortunately, the CIA spots his sub and orders its destruction.

episodes.name: Of Mouse and Man
episodes.overview: Brain plans to take over the world by creating a voice mail system that will tie up everyone on the planet long enough for him to take over. In order to do this he needs money. He decides to get it by getting a job and then staging an accident in order to sue the company.

episodes.name: Tokyo Grows
episodes.overview: Brain uses an enlarging ray to make himself and Pinky four hundred feet tall. With Pinky dressed as a Gollyzilla, Brain stages a fight to make himself look like hero. But then the real Gollyzilla shows up.

guest_stars.character: Gollyzilla / Scientist #2 / Man in Street? Soldier #1 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Frank Welker

episodes.name: That Smarts
episodes.overview: Brain makes Pinky smarter so his stupidity won't ruin anymore plans.

episodes.name: Brainstem
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain perform a song about the brain.

episodes.name: Pinky & The Fog
episodes.overview: Brain gains the ability to cloud the minds of men with his voice. He tries to get on the radio by adapting the persona of "The Fog". Unfortunately his plan falls apart when he gets to the studio.

episodes.name: Where No Mouse Has Gone Before
episodes.overview: Brain hears that a space probe is about to be launched. On the probe is a plaque with a representation of man and woman. Brain changes the plaque to make it appear that he rules the world. Aliens discover the probe and take Pinky and the Brain to their planet where they honor them just like they are "honored" on Earth.

episodes.name: Cheese Roll Call
episodes.overview: Pinky sings about cheese.

episodes.name: Brainania
episodes.overview: The Brain hatches a plan to take over the world by using static electricity to shock the world into submission. Unfortunately he needs several billion dollars to build a giant clothes dryer. Pinky and the Brain head to Island X where they set up a fake country and hope to get a giant foreign aid loan from the United States.

episodes.name: TV or Not TV
episodes.overview: Brain develops a special pair of dentures that can produce a smile that can hypnotize anyone who is not wearing a special pair of sunglasses. In order to take over the world, he needs people to see the mesmerizing smile. He figures that he needs to get on TV and in order to do that he has to become a celebrity.

episodes.name: Napoleon Brainaparte
episodes.overview: While France awaits Napoleon's triumphant return from Austria, Brain develops a recipe for exploding crepe-suzettes in an effort to conquer France. He uses the recipe in a cooking class and when the crepes explode, he is arrested. When he is taken to prison, however, his luck begins to change when people mistake him for Napoleon Bonaparte.

episodes.name: A Pinky and the Brain Christmas
episodes.overview: Pinky and the Brain head to the North Pole. Pinky just wants to see Santa, but the Brain has a more sinister plan. He wants pretend to be an elf so that he can mass produce a hypnotic doll named "Noddle Noggin" in Santa's workshop. He then hopes that Santa will distribute the toy all over world so he can take over.

episodes.name: Snowball
episodes.overview: Brain comes face to face with his former friend and now enemy, Snowball. And it seems Snowball has his own plans to take over the world.

episodes.name: Around the World in 80 Narfs
episodes.overview: In Victorian England, the Brain realizes that he can take over the world by becoming president of the "Pompous Explorers Club". since the position usually leads to the Prime Ministership of England. In order to become president of the club, he must make it around the world in seventy-nine days.

episodes.name: Fly
episodes.overview: Brain plans to melt the ice caps with the Hubble Space Telescope once he buys everything higher than the 39th floor.

episodes.name: Ambulatory Abe
episodes.overview: Brain hopes to take over the world by convincing everyone that Abraham Lincoln has been reincarnated. He takes up ventriloquism and plans on using a statue.

episodes.name: Mouse of La Mancha
episodes.overview: Brain tells a group of mice the story of "Don Cerebro" a mouse driven by his dream to take over the world.

episodes.name: The Third Mouse
episodes.overview: Pinky searches for the Brain in post-World War II Vienna. He misunderstands people when they try to tell him the Brain is dead and his misunderstandings lead to a series of misadventures.

episodes.name: The Visit
episodes.overview: The Brain captures two mice for an experiment to aid in a plan for world domination. He discovers however that the two mice are his parents.

episodes.name: It's Only a Paper World
episodes.overview: Brain tries to get all the people off Earth onto his paper mache creation, Chia Earth.

episodes.name: Collect 'em All
episodes.overview: Using Johannes Gutenberg printing press, the Brain make a series of collectible trading cards.

episodes.name: Pinkasso
episodes.overview: A successful modern artist is born and it's Pinky, trying to help fund Brain's new plan.

episodes.name: Plan Brain From Outer Space
episodes.overview: Brain hopes his inter-galactic pen pal, Zalgar, will help him take over the world. But it turns out Zalgar likes to snack on brains.

episodes.name: Robin Brain
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain get sealed in an Egyptian pyramid where a mummy is lurking about.

episodes.name: The Mummy
episodes.overview: Brain gets a group of men to steal money from the rich (ala Robin Hood) to pay for his new plot.

episodes.name: The Pink Candidate
episodes.overview: Pinky writes a letter to the newspaper criticizing the comic strip "The Family Circus". His letter, however, is misunderstood as a political statement that thrusts him to a spotlight that leads him to the Presidency of the United States. Pinky's administration, however, must deal with a scandal when the Brain's plans to take over the world are made public.

episodes.name: Brain's Song
episodes.overview: Brain makes a tearjerker movie to make the world sad enough to make him leader.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: Animal rights activist think Pink and the Brain are monkeys and release them into the jungle after taking them out of Acme Labs. The pair try to make it back home, but run into the Brain's old enemy Snowball.

episodes.name: A Little Off the Top
episodes.overview: Brain tries to discover what makes the legendary Samson so strong.

guest_stars.character: Queen Roach / First Lady / Time Machine Computer (voice)
guest_stars.name: Tress MacNeille

episodes.name: Megalomaniacs Anonymous
episodes.overview: When Brain comes to the conclusion he no longer wants to take over the world, he decides to help others who had his problem and the first one to be helped is Pinky.

episodes.name: Two Mice and a Baby
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain stumble upon a super powered baby, who happened to arrive from an exploding alien world.

episodes.name: The Maze
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain have to brave a virtual reality maze to find a microchip crucial to Brain's new plot.

episodes.name: Brain of the Future
episodes.overview: The mice's future selves arrive in the lab, sending them on a roller coaster ride through time to find a world domination kit.

episodes.name: Brinky
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain's DNA get merged during a cloning experiment, creating a new mouse.

episodes.name: Hoop Schemes
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain put together a basketball team as part of their next plan, but the fame may be swelling Brain's head.

episodes.name: Leave It to Beavers
episodes.overview: Brain enlists the aid of beavers to gain control over the flow of rivers.

episodes.name: Cinebrania
episodes.overview: The mice make a series of comedy films and hit the big time.

episodes.name: Pinky & The Brain ...and Larry
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain have a new companion, Larry, but their newest plan just doesn't seem to pan out.

episodes.name: Where the Deer and The Mousealopes Play
episodes.overview: In their latest plan, Pinky and Brain try to take over the steel mills in  Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania by pretending to be a part of an endangered species called the Mousealopes.

episodes.name: Brain Noir
episodes.overview: It's 1946 and Brain's new plan gets interrupted when he and Pinky encounter Billie and Snowball.

episodes.name: Brain's Bogie
episodes.overview: Brain gets caught up in winning a golf tournament, even though it interferes with his new plan.

episodes.name: Say What, Earth
episodes.overview: After the Earth gets the power of speech from his Silitronlinguifactor device, Brain comes up with a new plan.

episodes.name: My Feldmans, My Friends
episodes.overview: Brain tries to get a package meant for him back from his neighbor.

episodes.name: All You Need Is Narf
episodes.overview: Pinky becomes a guru during the 1960s.

episodes.name: Pinky's Plan
episodes.overview: It's Brain's birthday and Pinky plans a surprise party.

episodes.name: This Old Mouse
episodes.overview: After getting a glimpse of his future, Brain abandons his attempts to take over the world and gets a job as a ski instructor.

episodes.name: Brain Storm
episodes.overview: The mice are looking to control tornados, but a pest keeps getting in their way.

episodes.name: A Meticulous Analysis Of History
episodes.overview: Brain sings about past and present world leaders' failures.

episodes.name: Funny, You Don't Look Rhennish
episodes.overview: The mice need to get into a mine, but have to pretend to join a Amish-type society.

episodes.name: The Pinky Protocol
episodes.overview: Brain's latest plan is a conspiracy theory about why he is not ruling the world.

episodes.name: Mice Don't Dance
episodes.overview: Brain becomes a tap dancer with steam-powered legs in order to spread a subliminal morse code at the World's Fair.

episodes.name: Brain Drained
episodes.overview: Brain is out of ideas for taking over the world, so he tries to get some from writers.

episodes.name: Brain Acres
episodes.overview: Farmer Brain tries to grow an army of monster vegetables.

episodes.name: Pinky And The Brainmaker
episodes.overview: Brain creates a cloning machine and plans to clone himself in order to create the best Celtic dance troupe the world has ever seen.

episodes.name: Calvin Brain
episodes.overview: Brain masquerades as a fashion designer.

episodes.name: Pinky Suavo
episodes.overview: Brain plans to use the Personalitron to give him irresistible charisma, but it winds up going to Pinky.

episodes.name: T.H.E.Y.
episodes.overview: The mice learn of a secret organization, T.H.E.Y. (comprised of world leaders), and try to get in.

episodes.name: The Real Life
episodes.overview: A house needed for Brain's latest plot becomes the set of a reality series about the people living there. So the mice become participants to get in.

episodes.name: Brain's Way
episodes.overview: To save his Las Vegas casino, Brain works as a lounge singer.

episodes.name: A Pinky And The Brain Halloween
episodes.overview: Mr. Itch offers Brain control of the world in exchange for his soul, but Brain refuses. In a shocking twist, Pinky sells his soul to make it happen and Brain soon decides to get his friend back.

episodes.name: Brainy Jack
episodes.overview: Brain assumes the identity of Briany Jack, a hippie leader, and tries to create a peace chain to send a subliminal message.

episodes.name: Leggo My Ego
episodes.overview: Brain's attempt to control Emperor Franz Josef get side tracked when he talks about his problems with psychiatrist Dr. Sigmund Freud.

episodes.name: Big In Japan
episodes.overview: Brain enters the world of a sumo wrestling to acquire a paralyzing fish.

episodes.name: But That's Not All, Folks!
episodes.overview: Brain takes control of a satellite to air his infomercial around the world, but the satellite belongs to the military and they want to capture whoever hacked into their systems.

episodes.name: Operation Sea Lion
episodes.overview: Brain takes control over aquatic mammals for his latest plan and Pinky falls for a female sea lion.

episodes.name: You Said a Mouseful
episodes.overview: Brain tries to change the Earth's weather patterns.

episodes.name: The Tailor and The Mice
episodes.overview: A well-meaning tailor makes Pinky and Brain's lives miserable.

episodes.name: Bah, Wilderness
episodes.overview: At a sleep away camp for world leaders' children, Brain tries to trick the children into placing listening devices in their parents' offices.

episodes.name: Pinky At The Bat
episodes.overview: To release Brain's leather repellant, the mice become baseball players.

episodes.name: Schpiel-Borg 2000
episodes.overview: Brain's latest plan for world domination is the Schpiel-Borg 2000, which hosts a retrospective of past episodes.

episodes.name: Broadway Malady
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain stage their own seperate musicals, which have varying degrees of success.

episodes.name: The Megalomaniacal Adventures of Brainie The Poo
episodes.overview: Spoofing Winnie the Pooh, Brainie and Pinklet try to steal honey from a bee hive.

episodes.name: The Melancholy Brain
episodes.overview: Brain tries to create chaos in Hamlet's family and take over.

episodes.name: Inherit The Wheeze
episodes.overview: Brain tries to become a national hero by taking down a tobacco company.

episodes.name: Brain's Night Off
episodes.overview: Taking the night off from trying to take over the world, Pinky and Brain try other things.

episodes.name: Beach Blanket Brain
episodes.overview: Brain tries to get surfers to put on his suntan lotion, Brain de Soleil, which creates a hypnotic effect.

episodes.name: The Family That Poits Together, Narfs Together
episodes.overview: Brain enters Pinky's family in a contest to win $25,000.

episodes.name: Pinky's Turn
episodes.overview: Pinky has his own plan for world domination and Brain goes along with it.

episodes.name: Your Friend: Global Domination
episodes.overview: Brain explains why he should be leader in a mock educational film.

episodes.name: You'll Never Eat Food Pellets In This Town Again
episodes.overview: As network executives keep repeatedly changing their show, Pinky and Brain decide to quit.

episodes.name: Dangerous Brains
episodes.overview: As he prepares his plan for world domination, Brain goes to work teaching rebellious students.

episodes.name: Whatever Happened To Baby Brain
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain masquerade as a mother and child star respectively to get money needed for the next plan.

episodes.name: Just Say Narf
episodes.overview: Pinky sings a song about saying "narf".

episodes.name: The Pinky P.O.V.
episodes.overview: It's another usual night where Brain plans to take over the world, only it's seen from Pinky's point of view.

episodes.name: The Really Great Dictator
episodes.overview: The mice sing about world domination.

episodes.name: Brain Food
episodes.overview: Brain opens a restaurant and feeds the customers a drug to make them smarter.

episodes.name: Brainwashed (1): Brain, Brain, Go Away
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain are kidnapped in Washington, DC by an unknown force. Brain loses his memory and the mice are then imprisoned in a town where everyone is forced to perform the Schëerskåhøvên, which is dumbing down the entire country.

episodes.name: Brainwashed (2): I Am Not a Hat
episodes.overview: Brain regains his memory and the mice escape. They believe Snowball is responsible for the Schmëerskåhøvên, but him imprisoned in a mental institution.

episodes.name: Brainwashed (3): Wash Harder
episodes.overview: The mice and Snowball search for the one who spliced their DNA, Dr. Mordough, thinking he's responsible for all this. But it turns out to be his cat, Precious, and time is running out.

episodes.name: To Russia With Lab Mice
episodes.overview: Pinky and Brain's plan to alter caviar with a mutating capsule is complicated by a Russian lab mouse.

episodes.name: Hickory Dickory Bonk
episodes.overview: Brain plots to make every clock on Earth chime repeatedly.

episodes.name: The Pinky And The Brain Reunion Special
episodes.overview: A special of highlights of their career is on the air, but it's really all a ruse so Pinky and Brain can hypnotize the viewers.

episodes.name: A Legendary Tail
episodes.overview: Inspired by legends of the past, Brain tries to create a legend about himself to gain world acclaim.

episodes.name: Project B.R.A.I.N.
episodes.overview: How Acme Labs became home to Pinky and Brain.

episodes.name: Star Warners
episodes.overview: In the series finale of Pinky and the Brain, the Brain, and the characters from Animaniacs develop a Star Wars spoof.
